description: Bitstream encoding format for still images that generally result from the scanning of paper documents.  Offers lossless compression of bitonal (aka bi-level) images.  Developed to support the international use of FAX machines, i.e., the 'Group 4 facsimile apparatus' for which T.6 images are encoded.
